children.name: angel
children.sourceText: Hast thou seen an angel?

children.name: angels
children.sourceText: Why do not angels appear unto us?

children.name: appear
children.sourceText: Why do not angels appear unto us?

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Behold are not this people as good as thy people?

children.name: assemble
children.sourceText: Behold, we have built sanctuaries, and we do assemble ourselves together to worship God.

children.name: believe
children.sourceText: We do believe that God will save all men.

children.name: built
children.sourceText: Behold, we have built sanctuaries, and we do assemble ourselves together to worship God.

children.name: cause
children.sourceText: How knowest thou that we have cause to repent?

children.name: did
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: do
children.sourceText: Why do not angels appear unto us?

children.name: fathers
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: God
children.sourceText: Behold, we have built sanctuaries, and we do assemble ourselves together to worship God.

children.name: hast
children.sourceText: What is that thou hast testified?

children.name: have
children.sourceText: How knowest thou that we have cause to repent?

children.name: hearts
children.sourceText: How knowest thou the thought and intent of our hearts?

children.name: intent
children.sourceText: How knowest thou the thought and intent of our hearts?

children.name: is
children.sourceText: What is that thou hast testified?

children.name: know
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: knowest
children.sourceText: How knowest thou the thought and intent of our hearts?

children.name: men
children.sourceText: We do believe that God will save all men.

children.name: people
children.sourceText: Behold are not this people as good as thy people?

children.name: perish
children.sourceText: Thou also sayest, except we repent we shall perish.

children.name: repent
children.sourceText: Thou also sayest, except we repent we shall perish.

children.name: sanctuaries
children.sourceText: Behold, we have built sanctuaries, and we do assemble ourselves together to worship God.

children.name: sayest
children.sourceText: Thou also sayest, except we repent we shall perish.

children.name: spake
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: testified
children.sourceText: What is that thou hast testified?

children.name: thing
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest any such thing.

children.name: things
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: thought
children.sourceText: How knowest thou the thought and intent of our hearts?

children.name: traditions
children.sourceText: We do not believe in these foolish traditions.

children.name: worship
children.sourceText: Behold, we have built sanctuaries, and we do assemble ourselves together to worship God.

children.name: behold
children.sourceText: Behold are not this people as good as thy people?

children.name: come
children.sourceText: We do not believe that thou knowest of things to come, neither do we believe that thy fathers and also that our fathers did know concerning the things which they spake, of that which is to come.

children.name: seen
children.sourceText: Hast thou seen an angel?
